attributes.action: Invite Commonwealth of Nations to full membership of the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: We have a strong historical and cultural link with the Commonwealth of Nations. The people who live there have made the ultimate sacrifice for Queen (or King) and Country and have contributed to the economic well being of the UK. We should invite the sixteen Nations to join the United Kingdom with the same status as England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland. This would be put to a referendum in each Nations. If a Nation votes to accept the invitation then they would be accepted into the United Kingdom as equal partners and enabled to send MP's to Westminster. They would also be able to keep their own Parliaments as precedent as been set for this with the devolved governments in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
